isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: Install WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 81 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position windshield wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 3) at spline with wiper blade horizontal to bottom edge of windshield. Lift windshield wiper arm slide lever (Item 4) and push windshield wiper arm and blade assembly down onto spline, windshield wiper arm slide lever will lock windshield wiper arm and blade assembly into place once it is pushed all the way down.

Install windshield washer hose (Item 1 or 2) onto driver and/or passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 3) as required. If adjustment is required, refer to ADJUSTMENTS,
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
.
Turn wipers on to high speed and check for proper operation.
Close fiberglass tilt hood and latch hood on both sides. On 5000 i models with a butterfly hood close both right and left side hoods and latch both latches.
